sqlMap.statement: SELECT VD.VND_CD AS VND_CD , DCP.DS_CTAC_PNT_VAL_TXT AS DS_CTAC_PNT_VAL_TXT FROM VND VD , DS_CTAC_PSN_RELN DCR , CTAC_PSN CP , DS_CTAC_PNT DCP WHERE VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCR.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND VD.LOC_NUM = DCR.LOC_NUM AND DCR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DCR.CTAC_PSN_PK = CP.CTAC_PSN_PK AND DCR.CTAC_TP_CD <> #ctacTpCdDI# AND CP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DCP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND CP.CTAC_PSN_PK = DCP.CTAC_PSN_PK AND VD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND VD.VND_CD = #vndCd# AND CP.CTAC_PSN_ACTV_FLG = #ctacPsnActvFlg# AND DCP.DS_CTAC_PNT_TP_CD = #dsCtacPntTpCd# AND VD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DCP.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY VD.VND_CD , DCP.DS_CTAC_PNT_VAL_TXT
